name: OD27_5dim_equipment
title: OD27 fork of 5Dim's mod - New Equipment
author: 5Dim
description:
Equipment for OD27 fork of 5Dim's mod
Improve your character with a new bundle of objects for your power armor
This mod include:
- Batteries
- Exoskeletons
- Roboports
- Personal laser defense
- Personal tesla defense
- Solar panels
- Reactors
- Shields
